name: Damage Photo Editor - Prank Effects Camera & Hilarious Sticker Booth
name_original: Damage Photo Editor - Prank Effects Camera & Hilarious Sticker Booth
description:
Add damage effects to photos with just few taps to trick your friends!

Our stickers are very realistic, download this great App and create your hilarious photos.

^-^ LOL ^-^

======== How to Use
• Load or take a photo.
• Choose from different damage stickers or upload your own.
• Optional, move, rotate, mirror, scale and edit your stickers around the photo.
• Optional, change transparency or erase some part of your stickers.
• Share directly to Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, or send as a text message!

======== Features
* 60+ amazing damage effect stickers.
* Erase support, re-do, un-do support.
* Support gestures: paint, move, rotate, scale.
* Photos can be taken directly from Camera or Photo Album.
* Sharing via Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Sms and E-mail.

### Note ###
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only.
